ygData.subject: RE: Question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey archery at level 39 would be more useful than pickpockets at that level. or find traps, or... Leave us acellerando where it is rangers have archery at 1st
ygData.messageBody:
Hey archery at level 39 would be more useful than pickpockets at that level.
or find traps, or...

Leave us acellerando where it is rangers have archery at 1st level you just
don't get the combo before some higher level.

Actually don't really care but wish I could equip a bow for looks and random
rp'ing plinking
Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 10:06 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question...


From: <kim@...>

On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
> > > > This is a central distinction in the kiting issue. Snare (and
> > > > root) has to be cast on the mob, and thus can be resisted.
> > > > SoW and Accelerando are cast on the kiter, and thus cannot be
> > > > resisted.
> > >
> > > Then change the argument to someone having SOW cast on them
> > > and then running around using a bow.
> >
> > So you advocate taking away Accelerando from bards to give
> > them Archery?
>
> Actually, I missed where you said "Sow and Accelerando" and
> only saw Accelerando. *shrug* But still, if another class
> can use SOW and a bow.. Why wouldn't a bard be able to use
> Accelerando and a bow?

So you advocate not giving bards Archery or Accelerando until
level 39?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
